short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Messing up with videos in the browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you think that YouTube and Netflix are some of the best inventions? We agree! Now, imagine playing jokes with the characters in any video uploaded in the browser?

Sundai Filters allows you to connect with your favorite videos and start messing around with the characters.

Imagine a recorded work event where you can mess with your boss and put him a punch face, a video of your childhood projected in your anniversary party and people can play you jokes or a thematic Christmas event where people can play with the Grinch projected in the screen!

Play with your imagination and feel part of any  video with Sundai Filters! Download it now!

Sundai Video Filters work everywhere: YouTube, Facebook, Netflix, Prime Video and many more.
